thread.title: Selena Gomez and The Weeknd Met a Friend's Newborn Baby Together and the Pics Are Too Adorable
thread.title_full: Selena Gomez and The Weeknd Met a Friend's Newborn Baby Together and the Pics Are Too Adorable

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Selena Gomez and The Weeknd Met a Friend's Newborn Baby Together and the Pics Are Too Adorable
text:
With each passing day, it seems more and more like Selena Gomez and The Weeknd have been together forever. In just a month (give or take), their dates have escalated from regular restaurant outings to full-scale European vacations . And now? The miracle of life.
Yesterday, The Weeknd posted a picture of himself holding a baby to Instagram and captioned it "Uncle Abel."
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Uncle Abel
A photo posted by The Weeknd (@theweeknd) on Jan 27, 2017 at 2:53pm PST
Turns out, the new arrival is the offspring of the Weeknd's manager Wassim "SAL" Slaiby. And after a quick peruse through Sal's pics, I discovered that Selena also was there to meet Baby Slaiby.
Check out the collage Sal posted to his 'gram, specifically the top left corner. There's Sel standing next to The Weeknd while cradling the bundle of joy!
My bro told me "lead by example" üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß @theweeknd XO üôè #blessed #family
A photo posted by SAL&CO (@salxco) on Feb 1, 2017 at 11:54pm PST
What makes this whole thing even more beautiful is that either:
(1) the "Starboy" singer just happened to be with Sel at the moment his manager invited him meet his new baby, then asked Sel come with him, or ...
(2) the couple wasn't together at the time of the call, and The Weeknd went out of his way to bring Sel along.
However this baby meet-and-greet came to be, it's proof miracles do happen.
I'm not crying and giving Sel and The Weeknd's future babies names right now, you are .
From: Seventeen
